Header.title: Your Sustainability Partner
Header.paragraph: We believe in creating solutions that donâ€™t just work today but also protect tomorrow. As your trusted sustainability partner, we focus on eco-friendly practices, carbon reduction, and long-term value creation for businesses and communities.

About.paragraph: We, at AmeiseTech are integral part of circular economy, building solutions on principles of sustainability, providing benefits of effective energy management solution with the use of Second life batteries. This is a unique concept as we are reusing the asset which has got residual value, which is rich in energy content, but lived its life as a battery for a EV and now ready to be used for stationary application, to provide energy source for EV charging Infra, manage peak load at Grid or for various Industry and commercial applications where Back up power is needed. We as AmeiseTech acts as a System Integrator, building the right solution, in terms of Technical parameters and commercial effectiveness. We provide state of art solution which consists of Battery Modules, Invertors, convertors', Battery Management system, Demand Management solution etc. Based on our previous experience of working with Cities and Urban local bodies , Grid operators etc, we see demand for a sustainable & resilient solution. As part of our solution deployment, We would conduct Feasibility analysis, provide Training, Hand holding and Program Management and Operations & Maintenance support.
About.IIndparagraph: In addition to system Integration services we offer consulting services for Smart Cities, Digital Twin, Smart Transportation.
About.IIIndparagraph: Our past experience in Smart cities domain, working with Govt as a System integrator which involves activities right from Vision statement, Feasibility study, Stakeholder alignment, DPR preparation and finally program Management. Experience of working with various agencies like, Consulting firm, Master planner, Fuding agencies, Global OEMs, etc.

Testimonials.text: "Under the visionary leadership of Jayant Kohale, we have seen remarkable growth and innovation. His commitment to excellence and sustainable solutions inspires our entire team every day."
Testimonials.name: Jayant Kohale

Testimonials.text: "AmeiseTech offers services in Sustainable Digital Transformation.  We are an integral part of the Circular economy. Sustainability is a core of our business activities.We support organisations in their Design, engineering, and IT transformation needs. We collaborate with our partners in Feasibility Studies, program management, Offshore Technology, and engineering support. Our work revolves around Smart Infra, Digital Twin."
Testimonials.name:
Willem Jan Groenewoud
CEO
